title: Tattoo Font Redux
content:
Hey all,   
   
Looks like our recent discussions about tattoo fonts have already found their way into the archives . . .   
   
Anyhow, several of you asked me to post when the fonts were live and ready for purchase. you can check out Queen Rosie and Sweet Rosie as part of the new County Fair Picnic Font Set at the Font Diner.   
   
See 'em here: [http://www.fontdiner.com/menu\_cfp.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134115/http:/www.fontdiner.com/menu_cfp.html)

 [‹ Hudson from Thessaloniki 2004](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134115/http:/typophile.com/node/5555 "Go to previous forum topic") [Bad spacing in Filosofia? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134115/http:/typophile.com/node/5702 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Diner
